Articles.Content:
Windows 8 Lenovo Laptop

Intel 4000 Hd series graphics card

Whenever i start the game from steam, it instantly black screens and becomes unresponsive. Can't get it to go windowed or borderless windowed. Worked up until the last time i played, which was a month ago, have 118 hours ogged in steam
Please see [thread=92230]this thread[/thread]; we need log files, and probably a DxDiag output file.
I'll post that stuff tonight, i have to go get some stuff and go to work, thanks for the reply though

-Version .25

-After hitting play in steam, or even running as admin from local folders, a black screen pops up, always fullscreen even though I've tried manually changing to windowed and borderless. The black screen just sits there endlessly. Never loads and menu or even a loading screen. It stays like this until i bring task manager up and end task, no error messages. Every version worked thus far, took a few monthes break, and now it wont work.

-Output log

-Dxdiag

Thank you
